Last Reviewed:

2016-03-17

DESCRIPTION DEL PROYECTO Proyecto especial “Pajaritos” en el marco del Workshop en Tecnicas de Programacion Cientifica (WTPC) realizado en Buenos Aires, marzo 2016. Se analizan distintos cantos de pajaritos en formato .wav y .mp3 convertidos a .wav a traves de diversas metodologias estadisticas tales como analisis espectral.

Contents:

class bird.Bird(bird_dict, windowDT=1)[source]¶

Modulo de objeto de pajaro. Aqui se obtienen las propiedades del canto

sonogram = None¶

Read audio files (.mp3 or .wav) If audio file is a .mp3 it converts it to .wav format Returns a wav file: outWavFile

discover_files.verify()[source]¶

a very simple method to verify the class

This file enters a filename (“filename.format_extension”) If the file is not a .wav it convert it to wav format and returns the same filename with format extension ”.wav”

class periodogram.Crosspower[source]¶

A class to calc crosspower of 2 signals

calc(samples, samples2, rate)[source]¶

calc: parameters: samples samples2 the data arrays rate: the sample rate, must be the same for the 2 arrays

class periodogram.Periodogram[source]¶

A class to calc periodograms of a signal

calc(samples, rate)[source]¶

calc: parameters: samples the data array rate: the sample rate

This routine makes the plots, it receives the plot class frecVsTime, or envelope or sonogram and it saves the plots
